libutils.book module

Module for managing books in the library.

class libutils.book.Book(title: str, author: str, isbn: str)[source]

Bases: object

Class representing a book in the library.

class libutils.book.BookDatabase[source]

Bases: object

Class representing a database of books.

add_book(title: str, author: str, isbn: str) → None[source]

Add a book to the database.

Parameters:

  • title (str) – The title of the book.

  • author (str) – The author of the book.

  • isbn (str) – The ISBN of the book.

list_books() → List[Dict[str, str]][source]

Return details of all books in the database.

Returns:

List of dictionaries containing details of all books in the database.

Return type:

List[Dict[str, str]]

libutils.check module

Module for checkout functionalities.

class libutils.check.Checkout(user_id: str, isbn: str)[source]

Bases: object

Represents a book checkout.

class libutils.check.CheckoutDatabase[source]

Bases: object

Database for managing book checkouts.

checkout_book(user_id: str, isbn: str) → None[source]

Record a book checkout in the database.

Parameters:

  • user_id (str) – The ID of the user checking out the book.

  • isbn (str) – The ISBN of the book being checked out.

get_checkouts() → list[source]

Retrieve all book checkouts from the database.

Returns:

List of Checkout objects representing book checkouts.

Return type:

list

libutils.models module

libutils.storage module

Module for managing storage of data in the library.

class libutils.storage.Storage(database_folder: str = 'database')[source]

Bases: object

A class to manage data storage for a library management system using CSV files.

books_exist() → bool[source]

Check if the books.csv file exists in the database folder.

Returns:

True if the file exists, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool

load_data(filepath: str) → List[Dict[str, str]][source]

Load data from a CSV file.

Parameters:

filepath (str) – Path to the CSV file.

Returns:

The loaded data.

Return type:

List[Dict[str, str]]

save_data(data: List[Dict[str, str]], filepath: str, fieldnames: List[str], unique_key: str, mode='a') → None[source]

Save data to a CSV file.

Parameters:

  • data (List[Dict[str, str]]) – List of dictionaries representing data.

  • filepath (str) – Path to the CSV file.

  • fieldnames (List[str]) – Field names for the CSV file.

  • unique_key (str) – Unique key to check for duplicates.

  • current_time (str) – Current timestamp.

save_system_state(books: List[Dict[str, str]], users: List[Dict[str, str]]) → None[source]

Save the current state of the library management system in CSV format.

Parameters:

  • books (List[Dict[str, str]]) – List of dictionaries representing books.

  • users (List[Dict[str, str]]) – List of dictionaries representing users.

users_exist() → bool[source]

Check if the users.csv file exists in the database folder.

Returns:

True if the file exists, False otherwise.

Return type:

bool
